## Overview

Vocab+ is a micro-learning app that helps you learn new words and how to use them. It uses them in context, gives you a definition, and also allows you to see how people of the past would have used those words.

With so much information poured out upon us, we are losing sight of the beauty of learning things of value. Reading, writing, and learning how to speak eloquently and persuasively are lost skills and something we all need to develop. Vocab+ aims to bridge the gap between basic language knowledge and elevate users to more refined speech.

## Product Requirements Document

### Overview

**Product Name**: VocabPlus
**Platform**: React Native (iOS, Android, Web)
**Live URL**: https://vocab-plus.vercel.app

A micro-learning vocabulary app with TikTok-style browsing for discovering and memorizing advanced English words.

---

### Problem Statement

People want to expand their vocabulary with sophisticated, less common words but:

- Traditional flashcard apps are boring and feel like work
- Dictionary apps show definitions but don't teach practical usage
- No fun, engaging way to learn how words sound in different contexts

---

### Solution

A mobile-first vocabulary learning app that makes word discovery feel like scrolling social media ‚Äî quick, engaging, and rewarding.

---

### Original Requirements

> "Create me a micro learning TikTok style app for learning new words to expand your vocabulary. Create a database of useful, but less used/advanced words where you swipe through them TikTok style so that you can add them to your vocabulary. Make it fun/gamified, have like an example and a 'how to use it in everyday conversations' section too."

**Additional Requirements**:

- "Say it like a pirate" / "Say it like an old Englishman" fun variations
- Other creative versions (Shakespeare, Gen Z)
- Streaks & XP gamification
- 100 words in initial database

---

### Target Users

- Students preparing for SAT/GRE/GMAT
- Professionals wanting to sound more articulate
- English language learners at intermediate+ level
- Anyone who enjoys word games and self-improvement

---

### Core Features

#### 1. Word Cards

Each word displays:

- **Word** with pronunciation guide
- **Part of speech** (noun, verb, adjective, etc.)
- **Definition** ‚Äî clear, concise meaning
- **Example sentence** ‚Äî shows word in context
- **Everyday usage** ‚Äî tips for using in real conversations
- **Fun variations** ‚Äî same concept expressed as:
  - üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è Pirate speak
  - üé© Victorian/Old English gentleman
  - üé≠ Shakespearean
  - üíÄ Gen Z slang

#### 2. Navigation

- **Tap to reveal**: Word shows first, tap to see definition (tests recall)
- **Arrow buttons**: Left/right arrows to browse through words
- **"Next word" button**: Clear CTA to advance
- **Circular browsing**: Wraps from last word back to first

#### 3. Gamification

- **XP System**:
  - +10 XP per word viewed
  - +25 XP bonus when marking a word as "learned"
- **Levels**: Level up every `level √ó 100` XP (Level 1 = 100 XP, Level 2 = 200 XP, etc.)
- **Daily Streaks**: Consecutive days of app usage tracked and displayed
- **Achievements**: Unlock badges for milestones (first word, 10 words, 3-day streak, etc.)

#### 4. Word Management

- **Save/Favorite**: Heart button to save words for later review
- **Mark Learned**: Check button to mark words as mastered
- **Collections**: View saved and learned words in Profile

#### 5. Profile/Stats

- Current level with XP progress bar
- Stats grid: Streak, Total XP, Words Viewed, Words Learned
- Lists of saved and learned words
- Reset progress option

---

### Word Database Requirements

**Total**: 100 advanced vocabulary words

**Categories**:

- Feelings (serendipity, ephemeral, melancholy)
- Description (ubiquitous, ostentatious, ineffable)
- Communication (eloquent, loquacious, taciturn)
- Thinking (pragmatic, perspicacious, quixotic)
- Action (exacerbate, finagle, prevaricate)
- People (sycophant, dilettante, juggernaut)
- Time (ephemeral, nascent, quotidian)
- Nature (petrichor, bucolic, zephyr)
- Culture (zeitgeist, schadenfreude, ennui)
- Knowledge (esoteric, recondite, pedantic)

**Difficulty Levels**: Easy, Medium, Hard

**Each Word Includes**:

- Phonetic pronunciation
- Clear definition
- Example sentence
- Everyday usage tip
- 4 variation styles (pirate, old English, Shakespeare, Gen Z)

---

### Design Requirements

**Aesthetic**: Oxford Dictionary meets modern minimalism

**Visual Style**:

- Clean, lots of whitespace
- Elegant serif typography (Georgia) for word content
- Cream/off-white background (#FFFEF9)
- Subtle gray borders and dividers
- Minimal color ‚Äî only for action states (pink for favorites, green for learned)

**Interactions**:

- Haptic feedback on all taps
- Smooth transitions between words
- Reveal animation for definition

---

### Technical Requirements

- **Framework**: React Native with Expo
- **State Management**: React Context + useReducer
- **Persistence**: AsyncStorage (local, on-device)
- **Deployment**: Vercel (web export)
- **Platforms**: iOS, Android, Web

---

### Success Metrics

- User returns multiple days (streak engagement)
- Words marked as "learned" increases over time
- Users explore variation buttons (engagement with fun features)
- Low bounce rate on web version
